english_example_sentence: If I eat this delicious dessert, my mother would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если я съем этот вкусный десерт, моя мама будет очень счастлива.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu lezzetli tatlıyı yesem, annem çok mutlu olur.
